comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From kynghistory.ky.gov/history/3qtr/tags3qtr.htm William Birch Haldeman (with picture) Adjutant General of Kentucky: 1912 - 1914. Born: 27 July 1846, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. Assigned to position: 4 January 1912. Died: 27 October 1924, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. Buried: Section Q, Lot 115, Cave Hill Cemetery, Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky. More biographical information at familytreemaker.genealogy.com/users/w/i/s/Patricia-Wise-c... and www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=7462221

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the info!  We'll update record.
